content.text:
# List of presidents of the Republic of China__disambig_2

}}
This is a list of the presidents of the Republic of China.
The Republic of China controlled Mainland China before 1949. In the fall of 1949, the ROC government retreated to Taiwan and surrounding islands as a result of the takeover of the mainland by the Chinese Communist Party and founding of the People's Republic of China. Since 1949, the Republic of China, now commonly known as "Taiwan", has only controlled Taiwan and nearby islands. Martial law ended in Taiwan in 1987 and direct elections were introduced in 1996.
The official name of the office in Chinese has changed as follows:

Oldest living
Green text and an asterisk mark the inauguration date of a president older than any living ex-president. Other dates are the deaths of the then-oldest president.

Graphical representation
This is a graphical lifespan timeline of the presidents of the Republic of China (post-1947 Constitution) and they are listed in order of office.
ImageSize  = width:$width height:$height
PlotArea   = right:10 left:1 bottom:80 top:60
Period     = from:$start till:$end
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
Legend = orientation:vertical position:bottom columns:1
Colors =
id:bg              value:white
id:lightline       value:rgb(0.9, 0.9, 0.9)
id:lighttext       value:rgb(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
id:LIFESPAN        value:rgb(0.88, 0.90, 0.70) Legend: Lifespan
id:PRES_IND        value:rgb(0.7, 0.7, 0.7) Legend: Independent
id:PRES_KMT        value:rgb(0, 0, 0.6) Legend: Kuomintang
id:PRES_DPP        value:rgb(0.1, 0.58, 0.19) Legend: Democratic_Progressive
id:NAME            value:rgb(0.15, 0.13, 0.05)
id:TODAY           value:lightpurple
BackgroundColors = canvas:bg
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:lightline unit:year increment:1 start:$start
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:lighttext unit:year increment:10 start:1890
Define $dy = -5 # shift text to button side of bar
LineData=
at:$now color:TODAY width:0.1
PlotData=
bar:1 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1887 till:1948 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chiang Kai-shek
color:PRES_KMT
from:1948 till:1949
color:LIFESPAN
from:1949 till:1950
color:PRES_KMT
from:1950 till:1975
bar:2 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:left fontsize:M
from:1905 till:1975 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Yen Chia-kan
color:PRES_KMT
from:1975 till:1978
color:LIFESPAN
from:1978 till:1993
bar:3 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1910 till:1978 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chiang Ching-kuo
color:PRES_KMT
from:1978 till:1988
bar:4 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1923 till:1988 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Lee Teng-hui
color:PRES_KMT
from:1988 till:2000
color:LIFESPAN
from:2000 till:2020
bar:5 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2000 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Chen Shui-bian
color:PRES_DPP
from:2000 till:2008
color:LIFESPAN
from:2008 till:$now
bar:6 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1950 till:2008 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Ma Ying-jeou
color:PRES_KMT
from:2008 till:2016
color:LIFESPAN
from:2016 till:$now
bar:7 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1956 till:2016 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Tsai Ing-wen
color:PRES_DPP
from:2016 till:2024
color:LIFESPAN
from:2024 till:$now
bar:8 width:18
color:LIFESPAN align:center fontsize:M
from:1959 till:2024 shift:(-0,$dy) textcolor:NAME text:Lai Ching-te
color:PRES_DPP
from:2024 till:$now
TextData =
fontsize:M
textcolor:red
pos:($warning,30)
text:Updated /
TextData =
pos:(280,$height)
fontsize:L
textcolor:black
text:"Lifespan of each ROC President (post-1947 Constitution)"
}}
